Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, I-94, 130th and Eberhart due to police activity near 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, I-94, 130th and Eberhart due to police activity near 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Jefferson Park. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Jefferson Park.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
